The roof changes from shingles to a rolled roofing material near the chimney, which is common for low-slope areas. These transitions are more prone to leaks and should be monitored. Some sealant is present at the chimney flashing, which may only be a temporary fix. Recommend monitoring during the heavy rain.

caused_issues.id: III. HEATING, VENTILATION AND AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEMS_31
caused_issues.section: III. HEATING, VENTILATION AND AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEMS
caused_issues.subsection: C. Duct Systems, Chases, and Vents
caused_issues.title: Comments:
caused_issues.description: Comments: The HVAC ductwork appears to be older duct work. During the inspection, some registers showed visible dirt and possible microbial growth, indicating a buildup of debris within the system. While no major damage was noted, aging ductwork can develop air leaks, insulation breakdown, and reduced efficiency over time. Recommended to have the ductwork professionally cleaned to address the observed debris and potential microbial contaminants. In addition, a licensed HVAC contractor should evaluate the overall condition of the duct system to determine if any sealing, repairs, or full replacement is needed to improve air quality and system performance. F Client Advisory: This company does not inspect the interior of the HVAC Duct System. We do not inspect for, and are not qualified to render opinions on, any type of environmentalor other bio-hazards. If this is a concernor potential concern, Inspector recommends contacting a qualified professional of your choice for further information / investigation. issues.subsection: E. Gas Distribution Systems and Gas Appliances
issues.title: Buyers note: Gas Appliance Connectors (GAC's) are not electrically bonded
issues.description: Buyers note: Gas Appliance Connectors (GAC's) are not electrically bonded. Gas Appliance Connectors (GAC's) are the short run of yellow corrugated gas line similar in composition to Corrugated Stainless Steel Tubing (CSST) that connects gas appliances such as kitchen appliances, clothes dryers, water heaters, and house heaters to the natural gas piping in the home. Corrugated Stainless Steel Tubing(CSST) which is a similar material as Gas Appliance Connectors (GAC's), has been linked to fires caused from direct and indirect / close proximity lightning strikes. The lightning strikes have been linked to punctures / holes in the thin stainless steel tubing and igniting fires. CSST is now required to be properly bonded in an attempt to make it a safer product.

issues.title: Comments:
issues.description: Comments: Dryer vent contains lint buildup. Recommend cleaning dryer vent to reduce drying time. Proper venting to the exterior was not verified. Recommend cleaning dryer vent periodically to reduce drying time and risk of fire hazard.

Oneor more spray heads need adjustment for proper yard cover and reduced overspray on the house, fence, and paved areas. No rain sensor present.
